subject: Wages and Salaries
Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The National Hockey League salary cap for 2007-8 will rise to $50.3 million per team, an increase of $6.3 million, the league and the players union said yesterday. Each club’s payroll must be at least $34.3 million.
snippet: The National Hockey League salary cap for 2007-8 will rise to $50.3 million per team, an increase of $6.3 million, the league and the players union said yesterday. Each club’s payroll must be at least $34.3 million.
